title: State says NYC planned ban on foie gras sales violates law
description: New York City’s ban on the sale of foie gras had already been delayed by a court challenge

title: Feds order review of power-grid security after attacks
description: Federal regulators have ordered a review of security standards at the nation’s far-flung electricity transmission network

title: TikTok pushes harmful content to teens every 39 seconds, new report claims
description: A new report from the Center for Countering Digital Hate released Thursday claims that TikTok's algorithm serves harmful content to teens every 39 seconds.

title: US stocks sink as Fed signals it will remain aggressive
description: Stocks tumbled in the U.S. as investors grew increasingly concerned.

title: Mother arrested in case of newborn found dead in ocean: Police
description: "Baby June" was found dead, floating in the ocean off the coast of Florida, on June 1, 2018. Authorities said they have arrested the newborn's mother for her murder.

title: 'Narco slaves': Migrant workers face abuse on Oregon's cartel-run, illegal pot farms
description: "You feel humiliated, trampled on. You feel like dying,” one worker said.

title: Police officer found guilty of manslaughter in killing of Atatiana Jefferson
description: Jurors have reached a verdict in the Aaron Dean trial concerning the death of Atatiana Jefferson.

title: 2 previously extinct animal species have reappeared on the Galapagos Islands
description: Two species that were previously extinct on the Galapagos Island have reappeared a decade after an invasive predator population was eradicated.

title: Idaho murders: Person in white car spotted on video has 'critical' info, police say
description: Police investigating the University of Idaho murders are "confident" that the person in a white Hyundai Elantra spotted near the crime scene has "critical" information.

title: WATCH:  Man transforms work desk into epic ‘Polar Express’ train
description: Nathan Berillo was competing in a desk competition for work and took things to the next level.

title: Fugitive in 1991 stabbing caught on shrimp farm
description: Massachusetts State Police say a man wanted in connection with a 1991 stabbing death during a fight has been found, working on a shrimp farm  in Guatemala

title: Billie Lourd shares sweet photo of newborn daughter Jackson Joanne
description: Billie Lourd shared a sweet photo of her and husband Austin Rydell's newborn daughter, Jackson Joanne.

title: California set to lower incentives for rooftop solar panels
description: California utility regulators are set to vote on changes to the state's booming rooftop solar market

title: After World Cup success, Morocco has renewed aims to host
description: The idea that Morocco could co-host the 2030 World Cup with near-neighbors Spain and Portugal seemed a bit crazy when it was floated four years ago

title: House approves referendum to 'decolonize' Puerto Rico
description: The U.S. House has passed a bill that would allow Puerto Rico to hold the first-ever binding referendum on whether to become a state or gain some sort of independence

title: US to expand combat training for Ukrainian troops
description: U.S. officials say the Pentagon will expand military combat training for Ukrainian forces, using the slower winter months to instruct larger units in more complex battle skills

title: Georgia becomes latest to ban TikTok from state computers
description: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp has banned TikTok and two popular messaging applications from all computer devices controlled by Georgia’s state government

title: Oil flowing through Keystone Pipeline again after 600,000-gallon spill
description: For the first time in a week, crude oil is flowing again through most of the 2,687-mile Keystone Pipeline following a major leak in Kansas, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Record-breaking gingerbread village builder brings holiday cheer
description: Jon Lovitch is a gingerbread architect who has broken world records multiple times for making gingerbread villages that are entirely edible.

title: National Guard airman dies in snowboarding fall at NJ mall
description: A man who was serving in the Air National Guard died after he fell while snowboarding at an indoor ski park inside a New Jersey mall

title: 3 officials resign in Florida town where building collapsed
description: The town manager, police chief and assistant town manager resigned from their posts this week in the small South Florida community where 98 people died last year in a beachfront condominium collapse

title: Militia members who plotted to kidnap Michigan governor sentenced to years in prison
description: Three men who were convicted of several crimes in relation to a plot to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer have been sentenced to

title: Kosovo submits formal request to join the EU, Serbia angry
description: Serbia, another EU hopeful, is not happy.

title: Freed American says he's in contact with family, US officials
description: Suedi Murekezi, an American who was freed from Russian-controlled territory on Wednesday, said he has been in contact with U.S. officials.

title: Why experts in the nation's largest county think it may be time to bring back masks
description: As COVID-19 cases and hospitalizations rise in Los Angeles, experts tell ABC News it may be time to bring back masks.

title: Uvalde school shooting survivors tell their stories through photos
description: The project is part of Uvalde:365, ABC News' yearlong series in Uvalde.

title: Elon Musk sells $3.58B worth of Tesla stock, purpose unknown
description: Elon Musk sold another $3.58 billion worth of Tesla stock this week, but it wasn’t clear where the proceeds were being spent

title: Biden administration proposes crackdown on scam Medicare ads
description: The Biden administration has proposed a ban on misleading ads for Medicare Advantage plans that have targeted older Americans and, in some cases, convinced them to sign up for plans that don’t cover their doctors or prescriptions

title: Union Pacific railroad shipping limits generate complaints
description: Federal regulators and shippers are questioning Union Pacific’s decision to temporarily limit some businesses’ shipments as part of its effort to clear up congestion across the railroad

title: New York jury to decide brew-haha over definition of beer
description: The judge denied a request for summary judgment from Modelo, which is seeking to hold Constellation Brands liable for selling Corona-branded hard seltzer.

title: Nation's largest water supplier declares drought emergency
description: The nation's largest water supplier has declared a drought emergency for all of Southern California

title: House approves funding extension to avert gov't shutdown, buys time for spending deal
description: Passing a temporary funding bill avoids the federal government shutdown that would have begun Friday at midnight

title: Amazon worker shot, colleague returns fire killing suspect outside facility: Police
description: An Amazon contract worker was hospitalized and his alleged shooter was killed in an incident in a parking lot, according to police.
